name: media-toolkit
description: Server-side media processing toolkit with desktop app

scripts.dev: npm run build && npm --prefix backend run dev
scripts.install:all: npm install && npm --prefix backend install && npm --prefix frontend install
scripts.setup: npm run install:all && npm run build
scripts.deploy: npm run build && pm2 restart media-toolkit --update-env
scripts.electron:build-frontend: cd frontend && cross-env VITE_BASE_PATH=/ VITE_API_URL=http://localhost:3210/api npm run build
scripts.electron:build: npm run electron:build-frontend && npm run electron:prepare-deps && electron-builder
scripts.electron:build:win: npm run electron:build-frontend && npm run electron:prepare-deps && electron-builder --win
scripts.electron:build:mac: npm run electron:build-frontend && npm run electron:prepare-deps && electron-builder --mac
scripts.electron:build:linux: npm run electron:build-frontend && npm run electron:prepare-deps && electron-builder --linux
scripts.electron:build:all: npm run electron:build-frontend && npm run electron:prepare-deps && electron-builder --win --mac --linux
scripts.electron:publish: npm run electron:build-frontend && npm run electron:prepare-deps && electron-builder --publish always
